quotes.quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.

Life is a gamble. You can get hurt, but people die in plane crashes, lose their arms and legs in car accidents; people die every day. Same with fighters: some die, some get hurt, some go on. You just don't let yourself believe it will happen to you.
Two things scare me. The first is getting hurt. But that's not nearly as scary as the second, which is losing.
The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.
To hurt is as human as to breathe.
I don't want to hurt you or anybody so please forget about me. Just try. Find yourself a better friend.
I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much.
It hurts so bad to be ignored or rejected by that only person who means the world to you.
You will never know the power of yourself until someone hurts you badly.
If they keep hurting you, love them and stay or love yourself and leave.
I hope some day you realize what you meant to me. You were my everything while I was your nothing. You threw me away like trash the way she'll do you.
Sometimes someone can hurt us more than we really deserve because we had loved them more than they actually deserve.
To live is to hurt others, and through others, to hurt oneself. Cruel earth! How can we manage not to touch anything? To find what ultimate exile?
The stroke of death is as a lover's pinch, Which hurts and is desired.
That old saying, how you always hurt the one you love, well, it works both ways.
Love, to be real, must cost - it must hurt - it must empty us of self.
